metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1975 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: [NFC: netlink: fix sleep in atomic bug when firmware download timeout] Duoming Zhou discovered that the NFC subsystem in the Linux kernel did not properly prevent context switches from occurring during certain atomic context operations. A privileged local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash).

notes.Note: sbeattie> requires CAP_NET_ADMIN in the init namespace.
